info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Prince Edward County through 745 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prospect, or near Hampden Sydney, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in ponding of water on roadways in low lying and poor drainage areas. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hampden Sydney around 705 PM EDT. Hampden Sydney College and Darlington Heights around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Kingsville, Briery Creek Lake, Tuggle, Elam, Briery, Virso, Allens Mill, Worsham and Simplicity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
